text: Danti is an Italian surname. Notable people with this surname include: * Davide Danti (1938–2011), Italian illustrator/artist/translator * Domenico Danti (born 1989), Italian footballer * Girolamo Danti (1547–1580), Italian painter * Ignazio Danti, Italian priest, mathematician, astronomer, and cosmographer * Ignazio Danti (bishop) (1536–1586), Italian bishop * Nicola Danti (born 1966), Italian politician * Teodora Danti (c.1498–c.1573), Italian painter * Vincenzo Danti (1530–1576), Italian sculptor
title: Danti
